org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.nosql.NoSqlDatabaseManager

Packages that use NoSqlDatabaseManager
Package
Description
org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.nosql
The NoSQL Appender supports writing log events to NoSQL databases.
